dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 4154 IH: No Welfare for the Wealthy Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Cline (for himself, Mr. Hern, Mr. Self, Mr. Brecheen, and Mr. Perry) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 to close the nominal benefits loophole.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the No Welfare for the Wealthy Act of 2023.
Section 5(a) of the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 2014(a)) is amended to read as follows:

quoted-block.quoted-block-continuation-text: No household shall be eligible to receive benefits pursuant to this section if it does not meet the income and resource criteria under subsections (c) and (g).

subsection.text: Except as provided in subsection (b), this Act and the amendment made by this Act shall take effect 1 year after the date of the enactment of this Act.
The amendment made by this Act shall not apply with respect to certification periods that begin before the effective date of this Act.
